channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX

item.title: CVE-2018-1903|2024-09-17T03:23:03.691Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Adirect%20for%20unix
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct for UNIX 4.2.0, 4.3.0, and 6.0.0 could allow a user with restricted sudo access on a system to manipulate CD UNIX to gain full sudo access. IBM X-Force ID: 152532.
